text: "The Days" is a 2014 song by Swedish DJ Avicii and is taken from his extended play The Days / Nights EP. English singer Robbie Williams provides vocals for the track. It topped the single charts in the Czech Republic and Sweden. It went to the top 30 in Australia, Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Finland, Germany, Hungary, Ireland, Israel, Italy, Japan, the Netherlands, New Zealand, Norway, Slovakia, Slovenia, South Africa, Spain and Switzerland. It charted poorly in Canada, the United Kingdom and the United States. == Track listing == == References == Category:2014 songs Category:Avicii songs Category:Robbie Williams songs
title: The Days (Avicii song)
